name: Ankur Kala
briefDescription: Ankur Kala is a Women's Organisation, started in the year of 1982, by a group of women led by Annie Joseph, a qualified social worker from the Tata Institute of Social Sciences, Mumbai. Ankur Kala was the pioneer for providing economic empowerment for these voiceless women of West Bengal. Apart from giving various skill trainings, Ankur Kala specializes in imparting simple business management courses which has help numerous women to set up their own enterprises successfully. Presently Ankur Kala is working with 950 Women.
